page.title: 11STROMNESS BUSINESSES
page.content: Most aspects of Stromness trade are boosted by the many tourists who come to stay a week or come for a day trip on the St Ola. The tourist season is quite long and the Folk Festival and St Magnus Festival bring extra people. Local GIFT SHOPS : Hanleys,Bremners, BAKERS:Stockans,Argos, BUTCHERS:Fletts all benefit as do the many B&Bs and HOTELS.Some eg Wisharts hire out bikes while cars are hired out by eg Blue Star Garage. Buses can take people on tours to places of interest throughout Orkney. Within the town, they can enjoy the cobbled and flagstone street shared by two-way vehicle transport and pedestrians.Up some of the interesting little closes they may find an old Book Shop eg Books and Prints or a Restaurant eg Hamnavoe.
